CreepyGuy: ^Get out! You’ve no business nosing ‘round a man’s private things, poking at me sketches! They're nothing but ink on paper—mere scribbles.
^Stay away from me, if you’ve any sense. I’ve not got time for folks like you.
^Unless... unless you've got something important for me, then you can come in. But make it quick. Do you?

c-0: ^Quick give it to me and get out of here.
c-1: ^Off with you, then! You’re not welcome here.I’ve no room for those who come empty-handed.
